item.title: Need help - wood cutter
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[code]program New;
var
x,y:integer;
const
treecolor=2245215;//color of tree
treecolorInv=2322780;//color of tree in inventory
TimeCut=20000;
Tree=‘Bitmap path here’;
procedure load;
begin
loadbitmap(‘bitmap path here’);
end;
procedure cut;
begin
if(findcolor(x,y,treecolor,0,0,1000,1000))then
wait(1000)
movemousesmoothex(x,y,10,10,10,10,0)
wait(1000)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(TimeCut)
end;
procedure drop;
begin
if(findcolor(x,y,treecolorInv,0,0,500,500))then
movemousesmoothex(x,y,10,10,10,10,0);
clickmouse(x,y,false);

l l l------ ll l l--------
l l l l l l
l--------l l------ l ll l l--------
l l l l\ l
l l l l \ l
l l l------- l \ l---------

end;
begin
repeat
cut;
drop;
until false;
end.[/code]

Then put your find bitmap in there, and you will have to change a few things and add whatever else you want, and hopefully it will work, I hav’nt done SCAR for awhile so im encouraging some of our SCAR experts to come show a better l337 way

Goodluck obl
